price: Напротив! Заиста ће они тог дана да буду спречени да виде свога Господара.
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمۡ عَن رَّبِّهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّمَحۡجُوبُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: kallā innahum ʿan rabbihim yawma-idhin lamaḥjūbūna
